name: BSD-2-Clause-FreeBSD License
notes: This license was deprecated at SPDX because BSD-2-Clause-Views has been added, as a more generalized version; and because FreeBSD project community members have indicated that the final sentence is not part of that project's code license. It's original spdx_license_key Was SPDX BSD-2-Clause-FreeBSD
text:
The FreeBSD Copyright
